resources.string:
"Warning: CalcPass is security software and has not yet undergone thorough peer review. Only use this app if you were invited to test it by the developer or a security professional who has reviewed it's source code.
CalcPass is open-source under the GNU General Public License, Version 3 (GPLv3). This software is provided "AS IS", without warranty of any kind, express or implied.
Do you agree to the terms of the GPLv3 license? "
If you are new to CalcPass take a moment to learn How CalcPass Works. After you have created a seed tap Import below.
Sorry, this feature is not yet implemented.
Seed Name (exactly as it appears on card)

Tap Store to install this seed into the Android Keystore on this device. The Android Keystore is a highly secured area for storing cryptographic keys. Once stored, Android will ensure that only CalcPass can access this seed, and only when you authorize it to using your screen unlock sequence.

The import process is very sensitive. Now would be a good time to verify that there are no malicious Apps on this device. Google Play Protect can help with that. Now would also be a good time to check if this device has a Hardware-backed Keystore.
Switching to another App during the import will abort the import.
